description: Expanded default ignore patterns to cover all common build artifacts across major ecosystems (added .gradle, .dart_tool, .next, .nuxt, cmake-build-*, out). Reorganized patterns by category for clarity. Added comprehensive tests for Java/Android, Dart/Flutter, Next.js, Nuxt.js, CMake, and JetBrains IDE outputs. Updated README.md to document default ignore patterns and .julieignore usage. This follows "pit of success" design - users shouldn't need to know about .julieignore for common scenarios, only for project-specific needs.
